title.jp: Bling Bling￥ Enter the Gold Appears!!

synopsis: Kaito Gōshō, who helps out others with his friends Mitsuo Zaizen and Fukuta Kanemaru, rushes to the aid of their companion, Nagare Amano, who is being bullied. Kaito manages to get back Nagare's wallet by beating one of the bullies, Raigo Raigou, in a Hero Battle, a digital battle game using rented battle suits powered by support from spectators. Later that day, Raigo brings his older brother, Shuuto, to challenge Kaito to another match for revenge, deciding to make Kaito his henchman should he win. However, during the middle of the battle, the rental period for Kaito's 'Bad Boy General' suit expires, leaving him naked and defenceless. Just then, a strange man named Sennen appears before Kaito, offering him a contract for a powerful hero suit called Enter the Gold. Kaito hastily accepts the contract and uses Enter the Gold to defeat Shuuto and win the match. Following the match, however, Kaito learns that the fee for renting this suit is ten billion yen. Meanwhile, Nagare is approached by a mysterious figure, who offers him the same kind of power Kaito has.

title.jp: Sniper Cleaning ￥ Nagare Amano's Determination!!

synopsis: Kaito has been burdened with a ten billion yen debt in exchange for Enter the Gold. Big Money Company's Mitsuo Zaizen and Fukuta Kanemaru, and his sister Ai Gosho are in a panic! However, Kaito declares with sunny luminance that he'll pay back the debt. Then, Nagare makes a certain proposal. "I want to have a hero battle with you."

title.jp: Aim for Ten Billion Yen ￥ The Hero Wars Curtain Rises!!

synopsis: The prize is an astounding ten billion yen! Enthusiastic to take the championship and repay his debt in full, Kaito had planned to participate with his comrades from the Big Money Company, but cannot pay the 10,000 yen entry fee.

title.jp: Perilous ￥ Kaito's Regent!!

synopsis: With it decided that they will participate in the Big Money Hero Wars, Kaito and the others have their eyes on breaking through the preliminaries. But first, Kaito heads to his familiar barber to get some upkeep on his regent hairdo. However, a new beauty salon has stolen his customers and driven him to close shop.

title.jp: Burst Angler ¥ A Meeting With Piscesamurai!!

synopsis: Kaito and gang arrive at Big Money Bay to catch some fish for dinner where they meet the third heir to "The Fish Samurai Shop," the oldest shop in the Big Money Fresh Fish Market Castle: Isshin Uminari. The two of them immediately hit it off, but when they learn they are both in the Hero Wars, they clash in a Hero Battle! Whose passion will burn brightest!?

title.jp: Big Detention Panic ¥ Black Cat Shadow Kitty!!

synopsis: A rival appears for Big Money Company! Lead by Hana Akinai, their name is "Money-grubbing Corporation." Hana has cultivated the girl's "Detention Club," where they study with their clients into a huge success. Since Kaito hates to lose this gets his competitive streak all fired up. He starts the "Big Money Detention Club," but...

title.jp: Gappori Company Breakup ¥ Tea Picking Battle Royale!!
Blue Impact ¥ The Dominion Dollar!!
Fire Up ¥ Kaito Gosho's Intensive Training!!
Protect It ¥ Steamy Hot Spring Switch Shock!!
100 out of 100 Bulls-eyes ¥ A Big Riot at the Fortune-Telling Match, Though!!
Man of Steel ￥ Kintetsu!!
Flash Descent ￥ Deborah Kizaki!!
Trillion Swiftness ￥ Enter the Speed!!
Off-site Sprint ￥ Catch Up, Overtake, Uproot!!
Stromy Transfer Student ￥ Li-Chi Long!!
Round 2 ￥ Adults Have Their Own Problems!!
Heavy Attire ￥ The Dostorbrewski!!
Merciless ¥ The All-Powerful Ura-Dragon's Rampage!!
Drastic Measures ¥ Nagare vs. Isshin!!
The Semifinal ¥ Even If You're Broke, Smiles are Free!!
Final Round ¥ Gold vs Dominion!!
Battle of the Century ¥ Challenge Segalion!!
Cash Extinction ¥ Money Ghost's Counterattack!!
Mega Explosive Birth ¥ Enter the Hero!!
Conclusion ¥ The First and Last Big Brawl!!
The Money Fairy ¥ Boochakkin Ka-ching!!
Friend of Foe ¥ Sekito Sakurada!!
Money is Power ¥ Ryuuga Tennouji Makes Landfall!!

synopsis: After being helped by Sekito upon being knocked out by the barrier Tower of Seizure, Kaito learns from Hikari that Nagare was most likely converted into data and absorbed into the tower rather than crushed. Meanwhile, in the market district, a strange man named Ryuuga Tennouji attempts to buy out the fishmongers and cause dispute among their business partners. Isshin attempts to fight against him, but Ryuuga quickly defeats him before using another Tower of Seizure on the fish market to seize all of its property. Upon learning of the situation, Kaito confronts Ryuuga and his hero suit, Like the White Tiger, which proves to be too powerful for even Enter the Hero, forcing Sekito to rescue him. As Kaito laments not being able to beat Ryuuga, a man calling himself the cabinet prime minister suddenly emerges from his toilet.

title.jp: Take Down the Seven Gods of Suits ¥ Kaito's a Special Agent!!
